title: How to Start a Permaculture Food Forest #NaturalFarming #Shorts

tasks.task: Planting a fruit garden around each fruit tree
subtasks: Measure the area around each fruit tree with a two and a half meter diameter
Choose and plant tapioca, maravillikelinga, kappa, drumstick, papaya, bananas, and pumpkins around the fruit trees
Setting up a drip irrigation system for each circle around the trees
